abstract: The Staten Island district attorney, Daniel M. Donovan Jr., a Republican, announced that he was seeking to replace former Representative Michael G. Grimm in a special election.
snippet: The Staten Island district attorney, Daniel M. Donovan Jr., a Republican, announced that he was seeking to replace former Representative Michael G. Grimm in a special election.

headline.main: Staten Island Prosecutor to Run for Grimm's House Seat
headline.print_headline: Staten Island Prosecutor, a Republican, Vies to Succeed Grimm in Congress
